import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import S1 from '../assets/audios/S1.mp3' import S2 from '../assets/audios/S1.mp3' import S3 from '../assets/audios/S1.mp3' import S4 from '../assets/audios/S1.mp3' const ListeningSection = () =>{ const {register, handleSubmit, formState:{errors}} = useForm(); const onSubmit = data => { if(validator.isEmail(data.email)){alert("Nice Email"); history.push(props.path)} else{alert("Please provide a valid E-mail")} } return( <>

SECTION 1 Questions 1 - 10

Complete the form below.

Write ONE WORD AND/OR A NUMBER for each answer.

theft

) } export default ListeningSection;
